cn.title: 关于派银行发放 ADD、CHL 糖果并开通交易的公告

message.data: 派银行已进行 ADD、CHL 糖果的发放，同时开通 ADD/EOS、CHL/EOS 交易对及开放 ADD 交易大赛，详情：点击

Bitpie 社群：
新浪微博：@比特派钱包 weibo.com/bitpiewallet
微信公众号：公众号搜索“比特派钱包”
Telegram：t.me/bitpie1

en.title: Announcement of ADD and CHL Airdrops and Open of ADD and CHL Trade in Pie Bank

message.data: Pie Bank has opened the receiving of ADD and CHL airdrops. It has also launched ADD/EOS and CHL/EOS trading pairs and ADD trading competition. For more information please Click.
